examples.korean: She was trembling[shivering; shaking] with fear. 발음듣기 그녀는 무서움에 떨고 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: She was trembling[shivering; shaking] with fear. 발음

examples.korean: She gets scared easily. 발음듣기 그녀는 무서움을 잘 탄다 Neungyule
She is easily frightened. 발음듣기 그녀는 무서움을 잘 탄다 Neungyule
I realized for the first time how dreadful cancer is. 발음듣기 암의 무서움을 비로소 알았다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I realized for the first time how dreadful cancer is. 발음

examples.korean: He suddenly got scared when it became dark. 발음듣기 날이 어두워지자 그는 갑자기 무서움을 느꼈다 Neungyule
examples.english: He suddenly got scared when it became dark. 발음
